REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f5231 reute b f BC-CITY-OF-BERGEN-LAUNCH 03-17 0083

TEXT.TITLE: CITY OF BERGEN LAUNCHES 80 MLN CANADIAN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: City of Bergen, Norway, is issuing an 80 mln Canadian dlr eurobond, due April 13, 1994, priced at 101-1/2 with an 8-5/8 pct coupon, lead manager Bank of Tokyo International Ltd said. The issue will be sold in denominations of 5,000 dlrs and listed in Luxembourg. Fees are 1-1/4 pct for selling and 5/8 pct for management and underwriting combined. Payment date is April 13, 1987. There will be two co-lead managers. REUTER
